author: Edith M. Lederer / AP
title: Crime Rates Plummet Around the World as the Coronavirus Keeps People Inside
description: In the midst of a pandemic, even among regions that have the highest levels of violence, crime is dropping at an unprecedented rate.
content:
(CHICAGO) — The coronavirus pandemic that has crippled big-box retailers and mom and pop shops worldwide may be making a dent in illicit business, too.
In Chicago, one of America’s most violent cities, drug arrests have plummeted 42% in the weeks since the c… [+5900 chars]
